roleset.name: to go away, leave
roleset.note: DEPART-V NOTES: VN, FN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls resign-10.11, escape-51.1 (from depart.01-v)
DEPARTURE-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls resign-10.11, escape-51.1 (from departure.01-n)

example.name: both arguments
example.text: [*-1] Departing from decades of Soviet dogma , [the new system]-1 would lead to big differences in pay between workers and almost certainly to unemployment .

example.name: With destination
example.text: [He]-1's moved on since his acquittal, like Gary Glitter did after his 1999 conviction, *PRO*-1 having departed last June for a Bahrain "vacation" from which he's yet to emerge.
example.arg: for a Bahrain "vacation" from which he's yet to emerge

example.name: autogen1
example.text: Nigel Lawson 's departure from the British government

example.name: autogen2
example.text: such a departure from the past that many in the industry areskeptical CNN will follow through with its investigativecommitment , especially after it sees the cost of producingin-depth pieces

example.name: with arg2
example.text: his departure to India for the IPL
